v1

Class Comenzi

  • java.lang.Object
    • v1.Comenzi

  • public class Comenzi
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads all the input and executes all the commands.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Comenzi(java.lang.String inputFile)
      Opens the input file and the output file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanup()
      Deletes all the instances from the database that are older than a certain timestamp read from input.
      void deleteInstance(java.util.Scanner com)
      Deletes all the copies of an instance (given by the input).
      void executa()
      Reads all the commands and executes them or calls the specific method; Also closes the output file.
      void fatala()
      Prints all the nodes of the database that are not empty, along with the instances (and the attributes) they contain.
      void getInstances(java.util.Scanner com)
      Returns the requested instance (read from input) along with all its attributes and the nodes that contain it.
      void insertInstance(java.util.Scanner com)
      Inserts a new instance (given by the input); Creates new nodes if there are not enough in order to insert all the copies of the instance.
      void scaleaza()
      Creates a new node in the database with the same capacity as the others.
      void updateInstance(java.util.Scanner com)
      Updates all the copies of a certain instance read from input with new attributes; It also updates the timestamp for all of them.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
